title: Average Ambili
overview: This mini web series revolves around a youngster who's been bullied as a child for being average in academic and non-academic activities at school. Though Ambili has ambitions and wishes to do something really thoughtful she doesn't get any job for the same reason - being ‘average' even at job interviews. The storyline continues to follow Ambili and some unexpected events she faces in her so-called ‘average' life.
